We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private PivotPointsHighLow _pphl;
// In Initialize()
_pphl = PPHL(symbol, lengthHigh, lengthLow);

// In OnData()
if (_pphl.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "PPHL Is Ready", _pphl.IsReady);
    Plot("My Indicators", "PPHL Warm Up Period", _pphl.WarmUpPeriod);
    Plot("My Indicators", "PPHL Current", _pphl.Current);
    Plot("My Indicators", "PPHL Name", _pphl.Name);
    Plot("My Indicators", "PPHL Samples", _pphl.Samples);
}
# In Initialize()
self.pphl = self.PPHL(symbol, lengthHigh, lengthLow)

# In OnData()
if self.pphl.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "PPHL Is Ready", self.pphl.IsReady);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "PPHL Warm Up Period", self.pphl.WarmUpPeriod);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "PPHL Current", self.pphl.Current);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "PPHL Name", self.pphl.Name);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "PPHL Samples", self.pphl.Samples);
}
